resources.string: 1. What is the purpose of DALOY?
2. How do we use the application?
3. Is there an in app-purchases in the application?
4. How to contact the water suppliers?
To help the user monitor and control the water flow and consumption and provide an analytics wherein they can efficiently use the water.
By registerting your account first, you can go to our dashboard and see the different features integrated with the app
There is no in app-purchases in the application.

MWSS Regulatory Office Katipunan Avenue, corner H. Ventura Street, Barangay Pansol, Balara, Quezon City 1105(02) 8926â€“9284 mwssregulatoryoffice@ro.mwss.gov.phro.mwss.gov.ph facebook.com/MWSS.RO@mwss.ro

The Daloy application offers a real time information about the water consumption of the users, as well as the budget consumed in the process.We also offer a control that will automatically close the valve near the water meter, limit the daily water consumption and increase or decrease mechanism of water flow. The Daloy application also provides a user-friendly and easy to navigate UI that will surely peek your attention.
